scripts.build: npm run build-frontend && npm run build-server && npm run copy-frontend
scripts.build-frontend: NODE_ENV=production cd ./client && npm ci --cache .npm --prefer-offline && npm run build
scripts.build-server: NODE_ENV=production cd ./server && npm ci --cache .npm --prefer-offline && npm run build
scripts.build-docker: npm run build-frontend-docker && npm run build-server && npm run copy-frontend
